name: com.castsoftware.typescript
title: Typescript and frameworks Analyzer
description: This extension analyzes Typescript content in the application. Typescript Analyzer provides quality rules and automated function points and supports Angular 2+, NgRX, React, React-native and some of the main frameworks for Node.js Web applications such as Express, Fastify, Axios, Mongoose, TypeORM, Sequelize and Cloud service SDK like AWS, Azure, Google Cloud (GCP).
